name: Numbles
description:
Created for the 2016 ITAG Hackathon. 

Race against the clock answering increasingly difficult quick fire maths questions using addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. 

Questions are generated and answers float about the screen in number bubbles or Numbles. tapping on a bubble will pop it, but be sure to only pop the answer to the question or else you will lose time rather than gain it.

Suitable for children.
